headline.main: Suspected Camorra Boss Arrested in Brazil After 30-Year Run
headline.print_headline: Suspected Camorra Boss Arrested in Brazil After 30-Year Run

docs.snippet: A suspected boss of the Naples-based organized crime syndicate known as the Camorra was arrested Tuesday in Brazil after more than 30 years on the run, police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A suspected boss of the Naples-based organized crime syndicate known as the Camorra was arrested Tuesday in Brazil after more than 30 years on the run, police said.

headline.main: 12 People Fatally Shot in Chicago Over Memorial Day Weekend
headline.print_headline: 12 People Fatally Shot in Chicago Over Memorial Day Weekend

docs.snippet: Twelve people were killed and more than 40 more were wounded in shootings in Chicago during the Memorial Day long weekend....
docs.lead_paragraph: Twelve people were killed and more than 40 more were wounded in shootings in Chicago during the Memorial Day long weekend.

headline.main: French-German Euro Zone Blueprint Could Frustrate Cameron Plans
headline.print_headline: French-German Euro Zone Blueprint Could Frustrate Cameron Plans

docs.snippet: Germany and France have agreed plans to strengthen cooperation among euro zone countries without changing existing EU treaties, in a potential setback for British Prime Minister David Cameron as he holds key meetings this week with both countries'...
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany and France have agreed plans to strengthen cooperation among euro zone countries without changing existing EU treaties, in a potential setback for British Prime Minister David Cameron as he holds key meetings this week with both countries' leaders.

headline.main: Obama urges Senate to resolve Patriot Act issues
headline.sub: Obama urges Senate to resolve Patriot Act issues

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama is urging the U.S. Senate to work through its recess to resolve outstanding issues with the Patriot Act so it can be passed before it expires on Monday. Rough Cut. (no reporter narration)...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama is urging the U.S. Senate to work through its recess to resolve outstanding issues with the Patriot Act so it can be passed before it expires on Monday. Rough Cut. (no reporter narration)

headline.main: River Rafters Discover Wreckage of Aircraft in Grand Canyon

headline.print_headline: Slain Omaha Officer Who Was New Mom Honored at Her Funeral

headline.main: Fear Silences Human Trafficking Victims: Mexico Prosecutor
headline.print_headline: Fear Silences Human Trafficking Victims: Mexico Prosecutor

docs.snippet: Zunduri, enslaved at a dry cleaners shop in Mexico City, was so thirsty at one point she blistered her mouth trying to drink steam from an iron, and was so hungry she chewed the polythene wrapping used to cover garments....
docs.lead_paragraph: Zunduri, enslaved at a dry cleaners shop in Mexico City, was so thirsty at one point she blistered her mouth trying to drink steam from an iron, and was so hungry she chewed the polythene wrapping used to cover garments.
